stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {20.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({-0.5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else ({-5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else ({-10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else ({-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-1000.0: 1.0})))) if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({20.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else ({-50.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else ({-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-1000.0: 1.0}))))

lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {0.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 0.0 else \
                                   {10.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 10.0 and cancer_cost == -40.0 else \
                                   {20.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and (cancer_cost == -980.0 or cancer_cost == -90.0 or cancer_cost == -30.0) else \
                                   {(economic_value + cancer_cost): 1.0}
